Models¶

Card¶

Represents a Pokemon Trading Card Game card.

models.Card.id¶

Primary key for the card

Type:

int

models.Card.name¶

Name of the card

Type:

str

models.Card.type¶

Card type (Pokemon, Trainer, Energy)

Type:

str

Foreign key reference to the set

Type:

int

Relationship to the parent set

Type:

relationship

models.Card.decks¶

Relationship to associated decks

Type:

relationship

DeckCard¶

The base class of the SQLAlchemy.Model declarative model class.

To define models, subclass db.Model, not this. To customize db.Model, subclass this and pass it as model_class to SQLAlchemy. To customize db.Model at the metaclass level, pass an already created declarative model class as model_class.

CardSet¶

Represents a card set in the database.

models.CardSet.id¶

Primary key for the set

Type:

int

models.CardSet.name¶

Name of the set, must be unique

Type:

str

models.CardSet.release_date¶

Release date of the set

Type:

date

models.CardSet.description¶

Description of the set

Type:

text

models.CardSet.cards¶

Relationship to associated cards

Type:

relationship

query: t.ClassVar[Query]¶

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.
